title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo: the core tool that downloads, manages, and serves GGUF models behind a simple REST/CLI API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same feature parity as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, Chat, and Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web dashboard for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints.

title: ollama-cli (sammcj/ollama-cli)
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with interactive REPL, model search, and bulk pull/push helpers.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-ollama)
summary: Adapter that exposes Ollama models to VS Code GitHub Copilot via a local OpenAI-compatible proxy.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama4j (Java/JVM client)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library wrapping Ollama’s REST API with builders & reactive streams.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama API with Tokio streaming.

title: ollama-csharp (ollama-sharp)
summary: .NET wrapper that adds Ollama chat, completion, and embeddings to C# with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-django-chat
summary: Django + Channels real-time chat app that proxies to Ollama with user rooms and conversation history.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI microservice that adds JWT auth & rate-limiting in front of Ollama for SaaS usage.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Terminal UI (bubbletea) chat client with markdown rendering, history, and vim keys for Ollama.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of GGUF models pre-converted for Ollama with Modelfile snippets.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from notes via slash commands for summarization.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Python-based Telegram bot with group whitelist, session memory, and streaming replies via Ollama.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds inline code completion and chat sidebar powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama chat, code generation, and /imagine (SD) commands to any Discord server.
